get.summary: Retrieve map datasets for the requested bounding box

parameters.name: north

parameters.name: south
parameters.description: Southern latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: east
parameters.description: Eastern longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: west
parameters.description: Western longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Free text filter applied to corners and publications

parameters.name: distanceKm
parameters.description: Maximum distance in kilometres for publications

parameters.name: themes
parameters.description: Comma separated list of themes to filter by

parameters.description: If true, only corners currently open are returned

parameters.name: recentActivity
parameters.description: If false, recent activity points are omitted

parameters.description: Comma separated layers to include (corners, publications, activity)

parameters.description: Locale hint used for upstream providers
